title: is it possible to see if my account was previously punished in the past years
body: it just makes me anxious because i dont want to get reported for something stupid and then end up perma banned im not even that toxic

replies.body:
No need to be anxious buddy! It looks like this account hasn't had any punishments for a few years so you should be alright. That's not to say it's okay to start popping off in chat though xD! If you do need more context, you can absolutely reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) though.

Always try to keep a level head ^_^!
You may send a ticket to [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us). I am unsure if they will disclose this information but it's worth a try.
